FEATURED_SERVICES.TITLE: Electronic Services
FEATURED_SERVICES.SUBTITLE: Services provided by the National Center for Industrial and Mining Information

MARKET_PLATFORM.TITLE: Industrial Products Market Platform
MARKET_PLATFORM.DESCRIPTION: An electronic service specialized in displaying, marketing, and selling products manufactured in Saudi Arabia locally and globally.

SANA3I.TITLE: Sana3i Platform
SANA3I.DESCRIPTION: A unified electronic services and information platform that supports the investor's journey from idea to export.

CODING.TITLE: Coding Platform
CODING.DESCRIPTION: Indexing, classifying, and assigning a unified global code to national industrial products.

PRODUCTS.TITLE: Products Directory
PRODUCTS.DESCRIPTION: A directory containing information and data about products that enables users to inquire about products.

FACTORIES.TITLE: Factories Directory
FACTORIES.DESCRIPTION: A directory containing information and data about factories that enables users to inquire about factories.

SURVEY.TITLE: Industrial Survey
SURVEY.DESCRIPTION: Electronically surveying and collecting factory data easily by entering factory information and data.

FOOTER.MIM_COPYRIGHT: One of the initiatives of the Ministry of Industry and Mineral Resources

NOT_FOUND.HEADING: Page Not Found
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.

SERVER_DOWN.HEADING: Server Error
SERVER_DOWN.DESCRIPTION: We're experiencing technical difficulties. Our team has been notified and is working to resolve the issue.

CONTACT_US.HINT: If you have any suggestions or inquiries, please contact the portal team using the form below.
CONTACT_US.REQUEST_RECEIVED: Your request has been successfully received
CONTACT_US.SUBJECT: Subject
